title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view.

Observed Behavior: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: The item should be selectable on the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view.
3. Observe that the item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
4. Select the same item again and observe that it can now be selected.
